verbose_text: Recent studies have reported that insulin function regulation is initiated in hypothalamic nuclei, which control energy homeostasis [XREF_BIBR], and resistin reduces insulin sensitivity and signalling in the hypothalamic nuclei, as well as in adipose tissue, liver, and skeletal muscles by increasing serine phosphorylation of insulin receptor substrate-1 (IRS1) [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: serine phosphorylation of insulin receptor substrate-1 (IRS1
